title: Dear Diary
text:
Here are the recipes that made our home smell like love...
QUOTE: From Mummy's heart to our kitchen.

title: Recipe 1
text:
Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
Prepare the crust with love and care.
Slice apples thinly and mix with cinnamon and sugar.
QUOTE: A slice of nostalgia in every bite.

title: REcipe 2
text:
Mix flour, eggs, milk, and a pinch of magic.
Heat the pan and pour the batter gently.
Flip when bubbles appear and cook until golden.
Serve with syrup and a smile.
QUOTE: Fluffy clouds of happiness.

title: Recipe 3
text:
Cream butter and sugar until fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla extract.
Mix in flour, cinnamon, and a pinch of love.
Bake at 350째F (175째C) for 12 minutes.
YTVIDEO:
QUOTE: Sweetness baked with love.
